original_text: From Issachar's tribe, there were 200 officers and their relatives who obeyed their commands. Those officers understood that this was an important time for Israel. They knew what Israel should do.
korean_text: 잇사갈 자손 중에서 시세를 알고 이스라엘이 마땅히 행할 것을 아는 우두머리가 이백 명이니 그들은 그 모든 형제를 통솔하는 자이며

sentences.original_text: From Issachar's tribe, there were 200 officers
and their relatives who obeyed their commands
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 명령에 순종하는 그들의 친척들도 있었다

sentences.original_text: that this was an important time for Israel
They knew what Israel should do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘이 무엇을 해야 하는지 알았다
